docs.snippet: The United States Maritime Commission formally accepted the liner Brazil from the Bethlehem Shipbuilding Corporation at brief exercises yesterday aboard the vessel at the company's Brooklyn plant at Fifty-sixth Street. She will be transferred today...
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States Maritime Commission formally accepted the liner Brazil from the Bethlehem Shipbuilding Corporation at brief exercises yesterday aboard the vessel at the company's Brooklyn plant at Fifty-sixth Street. She will be transferred today to Hoboken for final attention preparatory to her entry into the South American service on Oct. 8.
docs.abstract: Maritime Comm formally accepts SS Brazil, rebuilt SS Virginia, from Bethlehem Shipbldg Corp; ship to open service; E J McCormack comments

headline.main: HOUSE FLAG RUN UP ON REBUILT LINER; Maritime Commission Takes the Brazil, the Former Intercoastal Virginia STARTS SERVICE ON OCT. 8 Vessel Will Open Three-Ship Express Service to South American Ports McCormack Gives Views Sweeping Structural Changes

docs.snippet: Statutes of the new "Federation of Latin American Workers" were approved today by the constituent assemly here. United States unions will not be formally represented by the new federation, which voted the Second International of Amsterdam in order to...
docs.lead_paragraph: Statutes of the new "Federation of Latin American Workers" were approved today by the constituent assemly here. United States unions will not be formally represented by the new federation, which voted the Second International of Amsterdam in order to obtain European trade union support.
docs.abstract: statutes adopted; Lewis says CIO will not join

docs.lead_paragraph: Morgan Annex at 11 P. M. GEROLSTEIN (Bernstein), Antwerp Sept. 20 (mails close 8 P. M.; sails midnight), from 2d St., Hoboken. Parcel post for Belgium, Belgian Congo and Luxembourg. MORMACTIDE (American Scantic), Gothenburg Sept. 21, Copenhagen Sept. 22, Gdynia Sept. 24 and Helsinki Sept. 28 (mails close 2 P. M.), sails from Exchange Place, Jersey City. Parcel post for Denmark, Finland, Poland and Sweden.

docs.lead_paragraph: THE U.S.S.R. has made available advance illustrations of twelve stamps being issued to publicize sanitariums and hospitals for Soviet workers in the Black Sea area, which is sometimes called the "California of Russia" land is noted for its climate, white beeches and historic castles.
